title: Our Mission
missionStatement: To make quality education accessible to every child, everywhere, through the collective power of purposeful saving.
missionBelief: We believe that when people save with intention and give with transparency, we can create lasting change in communities around the world.
visionSubtitle: A World Where Every Child Has the Tools to Learn
visionP1: We envision a future where no child is denied education due to lack of resources. Where school supplies, books, and learning materials are available to every student, regardless of their economic circumstances.
visionP2: Through AidVault, we're building a global community of savers who understand that their personal financial goals can coexist with—and even amplify—their desire to give back.
visionP3: Our vision is not just about providing supplies. It's about creating a sustainable model where generosity becomes a natural part of financial planning, and where the impact of giving is visible, measurable, and meaningful.
educationEqualizerDesc: Of all the ways to create positive change, we chose education for one simple reason: it works.
breaksCycleDesc: Children who receive quality education are 2x more likely to escape poverty and contribute positively to their communities. Education creates opportunities that ripple across generations.
highImpactDesc: Just 60000 RWF can provide a child with school supplies for an entire year. That's one of the highest returns on investment in charitable giving—tangible results for modest contributions.
empowersCommunitiesDesc: Educated children grow into community leaders, teachers, doctors, and entrepreneurs. By investing in education, we're investing in the future leadership of entire regions.
goalsDesc: We set ambitious but achievable goals and track our progress transparently

goals.description: Children with access to quality education by 2026

transparencyDesc: We believe you deserve complete transparency about how your contributions are used. Here's exactly how we allocate every dollar donated through AidVault.
joinMissionDesc: Every saver who joins AidVault becomes part of something bigger. Start your journey today and help us reach our goals.
